properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 5:30AM AKST until February 1 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Travel will be difficult.
Total snow accumulations of 4 inches, are expected. Visibility
one half mile or less at times is expected.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island.

* WHEN...3 PM today to 9 PM Saturday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause
areas of blowing and drifting snow. Conditions are not expected
to be as bad in the Bering Strait.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM AKST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
